General.Name: Royal Orchid Hotel (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Royal Orchid Hotel (Thailand) Public Company Limited operates a hotel in Thailand. It offers various types of rooms, food and beverages, and other ancillary services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Royal Orchid Hotel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Grande Asset Hotels and Property Public Company Limited.
